protected  Iterable<Shard> getNextOrderingOfShards(List<Shard> shards)
          Override this method if you want to control the order in which the shards are operated on (this comes in handy when paired with exit strategies that allow early exit because it allows you to evenly distribute load).

Specified by:
apply in interface ShardAccessStrategy

getNextOrderingOfShards

protected Iterable<Shard> getNextOrderingOfShards(List<Shard> shards)
Override this method if you want to control the order in which the shards are operated on (this comes in handy when paired with exit strategies that allow early exit because it allows you to evenly distribute load). Deafult implementation is to just iterate in the same order every time.

Parameters:
shards - The shards we might want to reorder
Returns:
Reordered view of the shards.
